title: Ticket #1008: Slot MATCHED when Schedd lacking WRITE authorization
description: In a configuration where a Schedd (submit0) does not have WRITE authorization to a Startd (execute324), the submit0 schedd might be allocated a claim to a slot on execute324. The negotiator can put the slot into the Matched state, which the schedd will never be able to activate. The REQUEST_CLAIM will be rejected. It seems reasonable that on such a failure, the slots state can be moved out of Matched. This may be tricky to resolve given the current layering.
remarks:
